formalText: She got home and kind of fell apart and Jim's comforted her and everything.

And that was the rest of the day like this happened right after her appointment with the therapist yesterday. All she could do for the rest of the day was sit and read her book because every time she stopped and tried to actually get some work done or do anything she would just fall apart again.
It's like she spends so much of her energy not thinking about things while she can't deal with problems and that she doesn't have
The attention that she ordinarily would have because she know a huge portion of my energy is going toward staving off this Panic that's there all the time.
She is kind of trying to talk about anxiety and she feels like she has been trying to act like it's not as much of a big deal as it is, but it's just really devastating for her.
She feels like it's crippling her.
She is so scared.
She doesn't even know what she is scared of.

So there were two messages from this guy with the ambulance company has been this whole thing where Blue Cross said, they weren't going to pay for any of the ambulance from one of those times one of the times she was in the hospital because it was like a non-emergency thing and even though so they had to write a grievance to them to say while she didn't have the option of refusing to take the ambulance.
Hopefully they'll pay for some of it at least but she had forgotten that that was sent in that they actually did that because she can't remember anything.
She just thought she had been ignoring this guy from the ambulance company and then another message was she actually didn't make it through all the messages because she was freaking out too much.
She had to hang up.
She applied for this job as a substitute teacher in the city with the public schools like back in January or end of December.
She had a message from when she was in the hospital in January offering her a job interview.
So that didn't happen.
She started freaking out just telling the therapist about it.
It was really freaking her out listening to it.
She thinks some of what she is scared of is like an intensity of her anger at herself for not being able to handle things.
She feels like she should be able to handle.
She thinks now sometimes she does want to kill herself for that or kill herself so she doesn't have to feel that.
She feels like she is constantly on the verge of just getting into huge trouble over something.
She just needs to take a day off.
She doesn't know why but she can't just get over it.
Or push through it or something.
Yeah, she doesn't know what's going to happen the rest of the day.
She really hates this.
But she hopes at some point she has to listen to the rest of her messages and she hopes she'll be able to do that soon, but she doesn't know.

She'll see how that goes.
